Package view

package view
Contains all view classes responsible for user interface presentation.

This package implements the View layer of the MVC architecture:

  • Handles all user interaction and display logic
  • Never directly accesses model classes
  • Communicates with models only through controllers
  • Maintains strict MVC separation of concerns

View hierarchy:

  • BaseView - Abstract base class with common menu operations
  • StudentView - Student-specific interface (browse, apply, view applications)
  • StaffView - Staff-specific interface (approve internships, review applications)
  • CompanyRepresentativeView - Company rep interface (create/edit internships)
  • LoginView - Authentication interface

Reusable components:

  • FilterMenu - Interactive filter menu for searches
  • TableView - Paginated table display with sorting
  • ViewFactory - Factory for creating appropriate views based on user type

MVC compliance:

  • Views accept Object types instead of specific models
  • Reflection used for type-safe operations without model dependencies
  • All data access goes through controller methods
  • Views only format and display data, never modify it directly

User experience features:

  • Pagination for large result sets
  • Interactive filtering with live preview
  • Formatted tables with consistent column widths
  • Input validation with helpful error messages
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

    Base class for all views - concise implementation.

    Concrete strategy for company representative dashboard.

    View class for company representative dashboard and operations.

    Context class for dashboard strategy pattern.
    DashboardStrategy
    Strategy interface for different user dashboard behaviors.
    FilterMenu
    Reusable component for filter menu UI.
    LoginView
    View for login, registration, and password change functionality.
    MenuOption
    Represents a menu option with a description and callback action.
    StaffDashboardStrategy
    Concrete strategy for staff dashboard.
    StaffView
    View class for career center staff dashboard and operations.
    StudentDashboardStrategy
    Concrete strategy for student dashboard.
    StudentView
    View class for student dashboard and operations.
    TableView
    Table view component - handles table display and pagination.
    ViewFactory
    Factory class for creating dashboard strategies based on user type.
